name: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Restoration of Erathia
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Restoration of Erathia
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Restoration of Erathia is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 03-03-1999. It was published by The 3DO Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Restoration of Erathia is available on PC.
It was scored by Paul Romero.
